name: tm83
effect: Teaches Natural Gift to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Work Up to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV: Natural Gift)

flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
The user draws power from the Berry
it is holding to attack. The Berry
determines its type and power.
flavor_text_entries.platinum:
The user draws power from the Berry
it is holding to attack. The Berry
determines its type and power.
flavor_text_entries.heartgold-soulsilver:
The user draws power from the Berry
it is holding to attack. The Berry
determines its type and power.
flavor_text_entries.black-white:
The user is roused, and its Attack
and Sp. Atk stats increase.
flavor_text_entries.black-2-white-2:
The user is roused, and its Attack
and Sp. Atk stats increase.
flavor_text_entries.x-y:
The target is infested and attacked
for four to five turns.
The target can’t flee during this time.
flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
The target is infested and attacked for four to five
turns. The target can’t flee during this time.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
The target is infested and attacked for four to five
turns. The target can’t flee during this time.
flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
The target is infested and attacked for four to five
turns. The target can’t flee during this time.
flavor_text_entries.sword-shield:
The user cuts its target with sharp shells. This may
also lower the target’s Defense stat.
